name: Blood Demon
description:
Blood Demon is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer with skilled hack-and-slash gameplay filled with hordes of enemies, unique bosses, and magnificent scenery. After being killed by the so called hero of legend, you accept a deal by the Blood Demon himself to possess the power to harness the blood of your victims and increase your power to claim your revenge.

Made by 

Zac Bowness
Elijah Molina
Usman Saleim
Tamjeed Zunayed
